r.d: This extension allows php applications to communicate with any Stomp compliant Message Brokers through easy object oriented and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Add two new ini options stomp.default_username and stomp.default_passowrd (Pierrick) - General performance improvements (Pierrick) - Fix stomp_read_frame when buffered (Pierrick) - Fixed bug #59217 (Connections to RabbitMQ via CLI). (Pierrick). - Fixed bug #59970 (acking a message makes rabbitmq disconnect the server). (Pierrick) - Fixed bug #67170 (Disable Nagle's Algorithm with TCP_NODELAY, it delays sending small messages). (Yarek Tyshchenko) - Fixed bug #68497 (Stomp client doesn't parse ERROR response on CONNECT). (Lorenzo Fontana) - Fixed bug #64671 (Add stomp_nack and Stomp::nack functions). (Pierrick)
